title: BANDS x AIML Collab P2 â€“ How to Maintain a ML Portfolio
description: Part 2 of our collaboration with BANDS focuses on maintaining your ML portfolio and keeping it relevant.

overview.definition: Learn strategies to maintain and update your ML portfolio to keep it relevant and impactful.

applications: Use platforms like Weights & Biases, DVC, Trello, and Evernote to manage your projects.
Participate in interactive sessions on portfolio management.
Stay current with ML trends and showcase your skills effectively.
tips: Document your work clearly using tools like Trello or Evernote.
Engage with competitions and industry insights to stay relevant.
